name: SpaceshipAdventure
0:
”Alexa, open Spaceship Adventure”
”Give me a tutorial”
”Set a course for planet X”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spaceship adventure
des:
Step into the role of a spaceship captain and make decisions on the fly to make sure you get the mail delivered on time. Try to get along with your inexperienced crew using your excellent leadership abilities. Watch out for pirates and asteroids and get rewarded for on-time deliveries. The galactic postal system needs you. Don't let them down.

Make sure you issue orders every eight seconds to ensure your Alexa link to the Spaceship adventure is not severed. This can be more challenging than you would expect! Bob, Greg, Jake, Mike, Fred, and Joe are all counting on you to make all their decisions for them. 

This skill is in the public beta phase. If you like it, please leave feedback and feature requests.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
